ADMINS.description: A JSON-encoded list of UserIDs that will be given bot administrative rights.

BLACKLISTED.description: A JSON-encoded list of UserIDs that will be blacklisted from using the bot.

BOT_TOKEN.description: The user token that the bot will run from.

INVISIBLE.description: Determines whether or not the bot will be invisible when turned on.

MAIN_CHANNEL.description: The ID of the default channel that will host the communication link.

OWNER_OVERRIDE.description: The ID of a user that will be recognized as the owner of the bot. (DON'T CHANGE UNLESS YOU SET THE USER BOT ON A DIFFERENT ACCOUNT)

PASSWORD.description: The password that is used to retrieve data from the server
